description: Black square in UL corner with brown tape in a "t" shape over square; black swan printed on tape.
inscription:
Inscribed in pencil within composition, LC: >> mein Schwan <<
Horizontal line in pencil below image
medium: Oil, black ink, white wash, stamped image on collaged element
portfolio: From Mein Schwan: Skizzen zu Einem Buch
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed:
Signed and dated in pencil, LRC: G Multerer │ 2001
Signed and dated in pencil below image, LC: G Multerer / 2001
title: Untitled (Swan on collaged cross)
